page.title: 18Two Small Farms in Pury End
page.content:
Mr Hobson lives at Kirby Farm House where he owns about 2 hectares and rents 4 more. On his farm he has twenty-five sheep, Manx, Soay and Ryeland. He also has two cows, three horses and some chickens. He has four dogs and a cat.
Mrs Smith lives at Little Farm in Lower Street. Her husband works in Luton and her son is at Paulerspury School. She has twelve bantams and chickens and five ducks. She has a Welsh mountain pony and three goats. Also she has three sheep and five lambs. She has two hives of bees, one dog, one cat and four goldfish.
